origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'ECBPolicyAnalysisAPI.get_report', 'description': 'This function provides an analysis of the European Central Bank's monetary policy impact on the Eurozone economy based on the latest report, focusing on specified economic indicators and countries.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of report to retrieve, e.g., latest, historical.'}, {'name': 'economicIndicators', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of economic indicators to analyze, e.g., GDP, unemployment_rate.'}, {'name': 'countries', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of Eurozone countries to focus on.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'A detailed analysis of the ECB monetary policy impact on the specified economic indicators and countries.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 ECBPolicyAnalysisAPI.get_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'reportType'是'latest', 'economicIndicators'是['GDP', 'unemployment_rate'], 'countries'是['Germany', 'France', 'Italy', 'Spain'].
